      • getExtensionReleaseJson

        private com.github.fge.jsonpatch.mergepatch.JsonMergePatch getExtensionReleaseJson(boolean trustSelfSignedCerts,
                                                                                   java.lang.String id)
        If the name is given, the extension is immediately returned from the internal extension list. If the URL is provided, the extension is fetched from the address , cached and returned
        Parameters:
        trustSelfSignedCerts - trust SSL certificates that are self signed
        id - the extension name or URL.
        Returns:
        the JsonMergePatch with the extension

      • readExtensionReleaseJson

        private com.github.fge.jsonpatch.mergepatch.JsonMergePatch readExtensionReleaseJson(java.lang.String extensionName)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getSchema

        private com.github.fge.jsonschema.main.JsonSchema getSchema(OcdsValidatorRequest request)
        Gets the schema with extensions, reads from cache this was invoked previosuly. The schemas are cached based on a key OcdsValidatorRequest.getKey(). This is calculated based on schema type, versions, extensions and verbosity. If not found, the schema is loaded from the disk for the given versions, extensions are all applied, then the schema is cached for further usage and returned.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        Returns:
        the schema

      • initSchemaNamePrefix

        private void initSchemaNamePrefix()
        Initializing prefixes for all available schemas

      • initExtensions

        private void initExtensions()
        Initializes predefined schema extensions, all extensions defined in OcdsValidatorConstants.EXTENSIONS are used

      • initCodelists

        private void initCodelists()
        Preloads all closed and open codelists. The open codelists are used to report warnings when new entries are found This is to prevent typos.

      • initMajorLatestFullVersion

        private void initMajorLatestFullVersion()
        This will read the latest available bugfix version for each majorMinor version of the standard. It is useful when the version specified in the version property is not full semver (1.1.3) but only the majorMinor versions (1.1), case in which the system will pick the latest bugfixiong version available

        @PostConstruct
private void init()

        Sets up and builds a new Apache Http client that can also fetch HTTPS urls
        Parameters:
        trustSelfSignedCerts - true if we can trust self signed certs
        Returns:
        the http client to use

      • createDeprecatedKeyword

        private com.github.fge.jsonschema.library.Keyword createDeprecatedKeyword()
        Creates 'deprecated' metaschema keyword used by schema metaschema. This keyword is used to defined deprecated fields that will be removed in later releases of OCDS
        Returns:
        See Also:
        DeprecatedValidator

      • validate

        public com.github.fge.jsonschema.core.report.ProcessingReport validate(OcdsValidatorUrlRequest request)
        Validates a request that contains the data from an URL (OcdsValidatorNodeRequest). This will convert the url request to a OcdsValidatorNodeRequest and then invoke validate(OcdsValidatorNodeRequest)
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        Returns:
        the report

      • validate

        public com.github.fge.jsonschema.core.report.ProcessingReport validate(OcdsValidatorNodeRequest nodeRequest)
        Validates a request with data coming inline (a pasted release/record-package/release-package). This is the main entry method where all the other methods of input will defer.
        Parameters:
        nodeRequest - the request
        Returns:
        the report

      • getJsonNodeFromUrl

        private com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getJsonNodeFromUrl(boolean trustSelfSignedCerts,
                                                                   java.lang.String url)
        Attempts to fetch the data from the given URL, and will return it in JsonNode format. This uses Apache HttpClient to fetch data.
        Parameters:
        trustSelfSignedCerts - if to trust self signed certificates for SSL/HTTPS connections.
        url - the url
        Returns:
        the parsed JsonNode

      • validateEmbeddedReleases

        private com.github.fge.jsonschema.core.report.ProcessingReport validateEmbeddedReleases(OcdsValidatorNodeRequest nodeRequest,
                                                                                        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode releasesNode,
                                                                                        java.lang.String releaseType)
                                                                                 throws com.github.fge.jsonschema.core.exceptions.ProcessingException
        Validates all releases given within the array releasesNode, and merges result into the same ProcessingReport
        Parameters:
        nodeRequest - the request
        releasesNode - the releases array node
        releaseType - the release type (can be releases or versioned-releases - used by records)
        Returns:
        Throws:
        com.github.fge.jsonschema.core.exceptions.ProcessingException

      • autodetectPackageVersion

        private void autodetectPackageVersion(OcdsValidatorNodeRequest nodeRequest)
        Autodetect version from package. This will attempt to read the version from the package version property and will use this unless the version is forcefully provided with -version request parameter. This will modify OcdsValidatorRequest.version accordingly
        Parameters:
        nodeRequest -
